trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bernardsville
There were no other sightings in Bernardsville on or around July 17th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking toward my house and happened to look up towards the east at what I initially thought was a yellowish color star. And almost parallel to that was another yellowish color star. So, I waited and watched to see if they were in fact stars or if they were moving using a telephone wire to determine any movement. They both moved slowly at which point I thought that they may have be airplanes. They looked like they were approximately 5 - 10 miles away. I thought it strange that two planes would be flying so close together going in the same direction. Also I didn't see the typical green and red lights on either side -- just these big amber color lights. All of a sudden they just disappeared. I thought perhaps they had flown behind clouds. When I looked straight up I saw stars and other planes that seemed to be flying at higher altitudes than what I had just seen. Just for the record, I have never in my life seen anything that strange. I think I'm more curious to know if anyone else in New Jersey saw these strange amber color lights at that time. I didn't think to take photos... I thought I was just looking a star.
